TopicTitle: Is this crash caused by exceeding memory limits?

Articles.Content:
My guess is that it is, but I'm hoping someone can confirm. Thanks. (running 32 bit)

mono.dll caused an Access Violation (0xc0000005)
  in module mono.dll at 0023:10118f0a.

Error occurred at 2014-08-26_234724.

C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Kerbal Space Program\KSP.exe
33% memory in use.
0 MB physical memory [0 MB free].
0 MB paging file [0 MB free].
0 MB user address space [82 MB free].
Write to location 00800000 caused an access violation.

These two lines:

0 MB physical memory [0 MB free]. 
0 MB paging file [0 MB free].

very strongly suggest that you may have indeed exceeded with 32-bit 3.5GB memory limit for KSP.

Consider getting Active Texture Management or forcing the game to run on OpenGL, both of which would save memory.

These two lines:

0 MB paging file [0 MB free].

very strongly suggest that you may have indeed exceeded with 32-bit 3.5GB memory limit for KSP.

Consider getting Active Texture Management or forcing the game to run on OpenGL, both of which would save memory.

Thanks. Already running ATM. I'll try using openGL.
